ph_input_content: Please enter content, type "/" to insert variable
desc_table_name: Table name; leading and trailing spaces will be removed by default, cannot contain special characters like / \ ? * : [ ]"; 1 character ~ 100 characters
desc_view_name: Table view name; leading and trailing spaces will be removed by default, cannot contain [ ] characters
desc_initial_fields: If table view name is passed, initial fields of table must be passed. Example: [{"field_name":"Index Field","type":1},{"field_name":"Single Select","type":3,"ui_type":"SingleSelect","property":{"options":[{"name":"Enabled"},{"name":"Disabled"}]}}]
